author: The Associated Press
title: Miami Preview Capsule
text:
By The Associated Press - Associated Press   
Miami 
Last season: 25-13, lost in the championship game of the National Invitation Tournament. 
Nickname: Hurricanes. Coach: Jim Larranaga. 
Conference: Atlantic Coast. 
Key returners: G Sheldon McClellan, led Hurricanes with 14.5 ppg and 54 3-pointers last year; G Angel Rodriguez, averaged 11.9 ppg and team-high 3.9 a; C Tonye Jekiri, led Hurricanes with 9.9 rpg and averaged 8.6 ppg. 
Who left: G Manu Lecomte, who averaged 7.9 ppg and was part of a crowded backcourt before transferring to Baylor. 
The Skinny: The Hurricanes return 73 percent of their scoring from a year ago, when they played in April for the first time. Kamari Murphy, a 6-8 transfer from Oklahoma State, adds size and defense, and this should be Miami’s best season since the 2013 ACC championship team - and maybe better.
